<!-- ApplicationPreferencesActivity --> <string name="ApplicationPreferencesActivity_currently_s" translatable="false">Currently: %s__new__</string> <string name="ApplicationPreferenceActivity_you_havent_set_a_passphrase_yet" translatable="false">You haven\'t set a passphrase yet!</string>
<plurals name="ApplicationPreferencesActivity_messages_per_conversation" translatable="false"> <item quantity="one">1 message per conversation</item> <item quantity="other">%d messages per conversation</item> </plurals>
<string name="ApplicationPreferencesActivity_delete_all_old_messages_now">Delete all old messages now?__new__</string>
<plurals name="ApplicationPreferencesActivity_this_will_immediately_trim_all_conversations_to_the_d_most_recent_messages"> <item quantity="one">This will immediately trim all conversations to the most recent message.</item> <item quantity="other">This will immediately trim all conversations to the %d most recent messages.</item> </plurals>
<!-- AppProtectionPreferenceFragment --> <plurals name="AppProtectionPreferenceFragment_minutes"> <item quantity="one">1 minute</item> <item quantity="other">%d minutes</item> </plurals>
<!-- ConfirmIdentityDialog --> <string name="ConfirmIdentityDialog_the_signature_on_this_key_exchange_is_different">The identifying key material for %1$s has changed. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that %2$s simply re-installed Signal and now has a new identity key. </string>
<!-- ConversationItem --> <string name="ConversationItem_message_size_d_kb">Message size: %d KB__new__</string> <string name="ConversationItem_expires_s">Expires: %s__new__</string> <string name="ConversationItem_error_not_delivered">Not delivered__new__</string> <string name="ConversationItem_view_secure_media_question">View secure media?__new__</string> <string name="ConversationItem_error_received_stale_key_exchange_message">Error, received stale key exchange message.</string> <string name="ConversationItem_received_key_exchange_message_tap_to_process">Received key exchange message, tap to process.</string> <string name="ConversationItem_group_action_left">%1$s has left the group.__new__</string> <string name="ConversationItem_click_for_details">Tap for details__new__</string> <string name="ConversationItem_click_to_approve_unencrypted">Tap for unsecured fallback__new__</string> <string name="ConversationItem_click_to_approve_unencrypted_sms_dialog_title">Fallback to unencrypted SMS?__new__</string> <string name="ConversationItem_click_to_approve_unencrypted_mms_dialog_title">Fallback to unencrypted MMS?__new__</string> </resources>
